Class Branch

java.lang.Object
homework3.Branch
public class Branch
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a branch of the company
Author:
Fatih

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Branch()
    Initializes the branch with hiring employees and adding products.
